summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2108, for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Renton Addition to the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, constructing granite stops, and including as a part of said work the necessary grading, under Ordinance No. 21202 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
